name: Ruel the Huntmaster
aura: Increase Ally C. RATE in in all Battles by 20

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. Transfers a random debuff from this Champion to the target if the target is under a [Hex] debuff.
skills.name: Vile Arrows
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Places an extra hit on enemies under [Hex] debuffs.

Will ignore 25% of each target's DEF if there are 4 or more enemies under [Hex] debuffs.
skills.name: Unleash the Hunt
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.desc:
Places a 50% [Increase ACC] buff on all allies for 2 turns, then places a [Hex] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns.

Also places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns and fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 50%.
skills.name: Stalk Prey

skills.desc:
Decreases the SPD of enemies under [Hex] debuffs by 5% and decreases the RES of those enemies by 10%.

Also increases the damage enemies under [Hex] debuffs receive by 10% and decreases the value of heals they receive by 30%.

These effects do not stack if there are multiple Ruels on the same team.
skills.name: Marked Quarry
